import React from"react";import Axios from"axios";import{useDispatch}from"react-redux";var http=Axios.create({baseURL:"http://39.107.87.215:8889"});//loading
function useLoading(){var dispatch=useDispatch();return function(loading){dispatch({type:"setLoading",data:loading});};}// 获取banner数据
function useBanner(){var dispatch=useDispatch();var loasingstore=useLoading();return function(banner){http.get("/banner").then(function(res){//用来返回一个函数，在组件的生命周期useEffect执行
dispatch({type:"banner_data",data:res.data,loading:false});loasingstore(false);});};}//获取热门推荐数据
function useRecommend(){var dispatch=useDispatch();//用来返回一个函数，在组件的生命周期useEffect执行
var loasingstore=useLoading();return function(recommend){loasingstore(true);http.get(recommend).then(function(res){dispatch({type:"recommend_data",data:res.data});loasingstore(false);});};}//获取移动端M歌单
function useMRecommend(){var dispatch=useDispatch();//用来返回一个函数，在组件的生命周期useEffect执行
var loasingstore=useLoading();return function(recommend){http.get(recommend).then(function(res){dispatch({type:"Mrecommend_data",data:res.data});loasingstore(false);});};}//获取移动端最新音乐推荐
function useMnewmusic(){var dispatch=useDispatch();//用来返回一个函数，在组件的生命周期useEffect执行
return function(recommend){http.get(recommend).then(function(res){dispatch({type:"MListNew_data",data:res.data});});};}// 获取移动端热歌榜
function useMhot(){var loasingstore=useLoading();var dispatch=useDispatch();//用来返回一个函数，在组件的生命周期useEffect执行
return function(hot){http.get(hot).then(function(res){dispatch({type:"Mhot_data",data:res.data});loasingstore(false);});};}//获取热门推荐数据
function useNewDics(){var dispatch=useDispatch();//用来返回一个函数，在组件的生命周期useEffect执行
return function(newdics){http.get(newdics).then(function(res){dispatch({type:"newdics_data",data:res.data});});};}//获取榜单数据
function useOrgdata(){var dispatch=useDispatch();//用来返回一个函数，在组件的生命周期useEffect执行
return function(Org){http.get(Org).then(function(res){dispatch({type:"topListOrg_data",data:res.data});});};}function useUpdata(){var dispatch=useDispatch();return function(up){http.get(up).then(function(res){dispatch({type:"topListUp_data",data:res.data});});};}function useNewdata(){var dispatch=useDispatch();return function(New){http.get(New).then(function(res){dispatch({type:"topListNew_data",data:res.data});});};}// 获取歌单分类
function usePlaylists(){var dispatch=useDispatch();return function(playlists){http.get(playlists).then(function(res){dispatch({type:"playlists_data",data:res.data,loading:false});});};}//获取歌单详情
function usePlaydetail(){var dispatch=useDispatch();var loasingstore=useLoading();return function(playdetail){http.get(playdetail).then(function(res){dispatch({type:"playdetail_data",data:res.data,loading:false});loasingstore(false);});};}//获取音乐地址
function useMusicurl(path){var dispatch=useDispatch();return function(mucid){http.get(mucid).then(function(res){dispatch({type:"musicurl_data",data:res.data});});};}function getUrl(path){return http.get(path);}function useInterTime(){var dispatch=useDispatch();return function(time){dispatch({type:"time_data",data:time});};}export{useLoading,useInterTime,useMhot,useBanner,useRecommend,useNewDics,useOrgdata,useUpdata,useNewdata,usePlaylists,usePlaydetail,useMusicurl,getUrl,useMRecommend,useMnewmusic};
